title: Kono Sekai no Katasumi ni (In This Corner of the World)
synopsis: Suzu Urano is a pure and kindhearted girl who loves to draw and keep her head in the clouds. Growing up in the outskirts of Hiroshima with her family, she is more than happy to help with her grandmother's nori business.
